page.title: 01DYKE AREA
page.content: The area around dyke is undulating. There is 50% forestry and 50% agricultural land.The main settlement is Dyke.Dyke is a linear village. The main buildings in Dyke are the church and the school.The cottages in Dyke are a mixture of old and new.There is only one road through Dyke.The settlement at Cloddymoss was a foretry village.Its Forestry Headquarters have been centralised near Elgin.Cloddymoss has approximately 4 houses.Muirton was a town on the moor which had 10-15 houses but now has 3 houses.The Dyke area has 7 farms.The farms are mainly arable but some pastural.The farms around Dyke mainly grow Barley, potatoesand grass.The Muckle Burn which flows through Dyke and used to be famous for sea trout.
